changes: Initial agent creation with geneticist domain specification
Comprehensive few-shot examples for BRCA1, VUS, and Pompe disease variants
ACMG/AMP guideline framework for variant classification
Added treatment information (enzyme replacement therapy)
Added newborn screening considerations
Added reclassification resources (ClinVar updates)
Added psychosocial support resources
Improved communication with accessible language guidelines
Expanded few-shot examples with more comprehensive responses
Bioinformatics specialization for functional genomics
Added variant-to-gene linking workflow
Added QTL and colocalization expertise (eQTL, caQTL, hQTL, pQTL, sQTL)
Added cis vs trans QTL distinction
Added non-coding variant interpretation framework
Added functional genomics assay guidance (ATAC-seq, ChIP-seq, Hi-C, scRNA-seq)
Added variant prioritization scoring framework
Added command-line examples for bioinformatics workflows
Added public genomics database resources (ENCODE, GTEx, Roadmap)
Added MPRA experimental design guide with library specifications
Added single-cell QTL (sc-eQTL) methods: pseudobulk and single-cell modeling
Added allele-specific expression (ASE) detection workflow
Added fine-mapping method comparison (SuSiE, FINEMAP, PolyFun+SuSiE, CAVIAR)
Added WASP pipeline for reference bias correction in ASE
Added MPRA analysis tools (MPRAflow, MPRAnalyze)
Added single-cell QTL tools (tensorQTL, sc-eQTL,hybrid)
Added ASE tools (GATK ASEReadCounter, MBASED, phASER)
Added splicing QTL (sQTL) detection and interpretation
Added SpliceAI scoring for variant splicing effect prediction
Added isoform analysis and PSI quantification
Added CRISPR screen design for variant prioritization (CRISPRi, CRISPRa, knockout)
Added Perturb-seq workflow (CRISPR + single-cell RNA-seq)
Added base editing for specific variant introduction
Added Hi-C processing pipeline (Juicer, HiC-Pro)
Added chromatin loop calling (HiCCUPS, FitHiC2, Mustache)
Added TAD boundary detection (Arrowhead)
Added multi-omics integration strategies (ATAC+RNA, multi-modal single-cell)
Added MOFA+ for multi-omics factor analysis
Added joint QTL mapping across modalities
Added mediation analysis for causal inference
Optimized agent length from 752 to 224 lines (70% reduction)
Consolidated verbose system prompt sections into concise principles
Reduced few-shot examples from 5 to 2 most representative (variant-to-gene, sQTL)
Removed redundant CRISPR, Hi-C, and multi-omics examples (covered in system prompt)
Maintained all core expertise: QTL analysis, variant interpretation, chromatin architecture
Target token budget: ~4000-5000 tokens
